content: अनुवादः {@--1@} Repetition (in general); गुण° <ls>K. 206.</ls> {@--2@} Repetition by way of explanation, illustration or corroboration; अनुवादे चरणानां <ls>P. II. 4. 3</ls> (सिद्धस्योपन्यासे <ls>Sk.</ls>). {@--3@} Explanatory repetition or reference to what is already mentioned, such as paraphrase or free translation; particularly, any portion of the Brāhmaṇas which comments on, illustrates, or explains a {%Vidhi%} or direction previously laid down and which does not itself lay down any directions; a supplementary repetition, <ab>opp.</ab> to विधि ‘authoritative or direct injunction’; विधिविहितस्य अनुवचनमनुवादः . नानुवादपुनरुक्तयोः विशेषः शब्दाभ्यासोपपत्तेः <ls>Nyāya Sūtra</ls>. It is of {3} kinds:--भूतार्थ° (सदेव सौम्येदमग्र आसीत्); स्तुत्यर्थ° (वायुर्वै क्षेपिष्ठा देवता) and गुण° (अग्निहोत्रं जुहोति इत्युक्ते दध्ना जुहोति इति गुणविधानांत्); see अर्थवाद also. {@--4@} Corroboration, confirmation. {@--5@} Slander, abuse, reviling. {@--6@} Advertisement, notice; report, rumour. {@--7@} Commencement of speech ( वाचारंभणमात्रं.).
